title: Orphans and Their Quests: with Manvir Singh
description:
I speak with Harvard phd student Manvir Sing about an article he wrote called Orphans and Their Quests. We discuss the "the sympathetic plot," which explores aspects and themes seen in stories around the world.

Podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Orphans-and-Their-Quests-with-Manvir-Singh-eaau50
Here is the original article: https://aeon.co/essays/what-makes-the-sympathetic-plot-a-universal-story-type

Follow Manvir on twitter here: @mnvrsng
Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
